title: Rise Of The Shadow Seekers, The First Seeker
description: With a flash of light, and a crack of thunder, Alexâ€™s world is changed forever. With the aid of his friends, and an old spyglass that can reveal the things that lurk in the shadows, he will discover an ancient threat growing within the town of Sundown, and possibly the world. What will he discover in the shadows? Will he stop the spreading curse before it's too late? Find out in Rise of the Shadow Seekers, The First Seeker.
author: Korey Ward
